# YMShop - IT Products E-Commerce Store

This is a TypeScript React e-commerce application for ymshop, specializing in IT products and accessories.

## Project Structure
- React 18 with TypeScript
- Vite for build tooling
- React Router for navigation
- Modern e-commerce features including product catalog, shopping cart, and location display

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow React best practices and hooks patterns
- Maintain responsive design for mobile and desktop
- Keep components modular and reusable
